## Overview

The World module provides the simulation environment for marine autonomous vehicles, including:

- Environment parameters (water density, gravity, etc.)
- Multiple vessel management
- Time stepping and synchronization
- ROS2 integration support

## Features

- Environment configuration
- Vessel management
- Time stepping
- ROS2 node coordination
- World state management

## Usage Example

```python
from mav_simulator.class_world import World

# Create a world instance
world = World(config_file='simulation_config.yml')

# Add vessels to the world
vessel1 = Vessel(vessel_params1, hydro_data1, vessel_id=1)
vessel2 = Vessel(vessel_params2, hydro_data2, vessel_id=2)
world.add_vessel(vessel1)
world.add_vessel(vessel2)

# Run simulation
while world.time < world.end_time:
    world.step()
```
